list.abs: because when you drink , you get chatty ., 因为每次你一喝酒话就开始多.
Sir John was very chatty ., 约翰爵士十分健谈.
you are a sociable and chatty man ., 你是一个爱和人交往和爱闲聊的男人.
Quite chatty after knowing the person ., 相当爱讲闲话在知道人之后.

auth_sentence.content: However, just entering the workshop, Chatti carefully notes, is an earned privilege.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, just entering the workshop, Chatti carefully notes, is an earned privilege.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, just entering the workshop, Chatti carefully notes, is an earned privilege.
